name: Abdominal Stretch
effect:
When successfully played, you may discard 3 cards, search through your Arsenal and put 1 card into your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.
"This will certainly swing the tide of the match in a hurry." - Jim Ross

name: Ankle Lock
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
"He's gonna tap! He's done!" - Jim Ross

name: Arm Bar
effect:
When successfully played, discard 1 card of your choice from your hand.
"He's wearing the man down with that simple maneuver." - Jim Ross

name: Arm Bar Takedown
effect:
As an action, you may discard this card to draw 1 card. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent.
"Great use of leverage!" - Kevin Kelly

name: Arm Drag
effect:
When successfully played, discard 1 card of your choice from your hand.
"Textbook maneuver for any wrestler." - Jim Ross

name: Atomic Drop
effect:
When successfully played, if your next card played this turn is a maneuver it is +2D.
"That'll rattle your cage!" - Jim Ross

name: Atomic Facebuster
effect: "Great innovation, on that move!" - Kevin Kelly

name: Austin Elbow Smash
effect:
May not be reversed.
Can only be played after a maneuver that does 5D or greater.
Unique
"Measured perfectly by the Rattlesnake!" - Jim Ross

name: Ayatollah of Rock 'n' Roll-a
effect:
Look at your opponent's hand. For the rest of this turn, your opponent's reversals revealed from his Arsenal while applying damage may not reverse your maneuvers.
Unique
"Jericho is synonymous with charisma and personality!" - Jim Ross

name: Back Body Drop
effect:
The card titled Irish Whip must be played before playing this card.
When successfully played, you may either draw 2 cards, or force opponent to discard 2 cards.
Stun Value: 1
"Amazing elevation, on that one!" - Jim Ross

name: Back Breaker
effect: "A chiropractor's dream!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Bear Hug
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
"Just like a big ol' grizzly!" - Jim Ross

name: Belly to Back Suplex
effect:
May only reverse the maneuver titled Belly to Back Suplex.
"Oh, that's like getting a piano slammed over your head!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Belly to Belly Suplex
effect:
May only reverse the maneuver titled Belly to Belly Suplex.
"Who's gonna hit it? Anyone's guess!" - Jim Ross

name: Big Boot
effect: "That knocked a few teeth loose!" - Jim Ross

name: Body Slam
effect:
SV: 1
"That might look easy, but he just lifted a 300lbs. man!" - Michael Cole

name: Boston Crab
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
"He's making a pretzel out there ... of his opponent!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Bow & Arrow
effect: "No way, this move is impossible to lock in ... Amazing he got it!" - Michael Cole

name: Break the Hold
effect:
Reverse any Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
"He's gonna get outta it! He's reaching for the side rope." - Jim Ross

name: Bulldog
effect:
When successfully played, discard 1 card of your choice from your hand. Look at opponent's hand, then choose and discard 1 card from his hand.
"That's a good way to break a nose!" - Jim Ross

name: Camel Clutch
effect:
When successfully played, look through your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.
"He's leaning back, way back and applying the pressure." - Jim Ross

name: Chair Shot
effect:
SV: 1
"That's solid steel, folks. There ain't no give!" - Jim Ross

name: Cheap Shot From the Corner
effect:
To play this card you must be an "inactive" player of your team. After your "active" partner has successfully played a maneuver of 5D or greater, you can play this card as the very next card against his opponent. Opponent may attempt to reverse the maneuver as usual.
"I didn't see anything, what are you talking about?" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Chicken Wing
effect:
When successfully played, shuffle 2 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.
"Do you like them regular, crispy, or broken?" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Chin Lock
effect: "His eyes are about to pop outta his head!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Choke Hold
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
"Hey, ref, stop him, that's an illegal hold!" - Jim Ross

name: Chop
effect:
As an action, you may discard this card to draw 1 card. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent.
"That's gonna leave a mark!" - Jim Ross

name: CHRIS JERICHO
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Once during your turn, you may discard a card from your hand to force your opponent to discard a card from his hand.

name: Chyna Interferes
effect:
Reverses any maneuver and ends your opponent's turn.
If played from your hand, draw 2 cards.
Unique
"Another low blow by the Ninth Wonder of the World." - Jim Ross

name: Clean Break
effect:
If played from your hand, may reverse the card titled Jockeying for Position. Opponent must discard 4 cards. End your opponent's turn. Draw 1 card.
"Looks like he's had enough, maybe not?" - Jim Ross

name: Clothesline
effect:
When successfully played, if your next card played this turn is a maneuver it is +2D.
Stun Value: 1
"Get out the neck brace!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Cobra Clutch
effect:
When successfully played, look through your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.
"Few have ever seen a victory after this move ..." - Jim Ross

name: Collar & Elbow Lockup
effect:
As an action, you may discard this card to draw 1 card. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent.
"And we've got a lockup to begin things off ..." - Michael Cole

name: Combination Attack
effect:
Play only after a 4D or greater maneuver. A single "inactive" team partner may discard any maneuver of 6D or less from his hand and add the D value of that maneuver to the D value of this maneuver. Read as 10 when in your Ring area.
Stun Value: 1
"Amazing teamwork!" - Jim Ross

name: Comeback!
effect:
Discard 3 cards of your choice from your hand. All players compare their current Fortitude Rating. The player(s) with a higher Fortitude Rating must remove maneuver and/or reversal cards from their Ring area, putting them into his Ringside pile, until that player's Fortitude Rating is less than or equal to the others.
"Wait a minute!?!" - Jim Ross

name: Cross Body Block
effect:
The card titled Irish Whip must be played before playing this card.
May only reverse a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip.
"That maneuver just jarred the whole ring, good God!" - Jim Ross

name: DDT
effect:
When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile. Opponent must discard 2 cards.
Stun Value: 1
"This one never gets old ..." - Jim Ross

name: Deluding Yourself
effect:
Draw 4 cards.
At end of turn, discard your hand.
"And the proud will be humbled, King!" - Jim Ross

name: Discus Punch
effect:
Reversals to this maneuver are +2D.
"Ow! Is that legal?" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Disqualification!
effect:
Reverse any HEEL maneuver or reversal card if that opponent has 5 or more HEEL cards in his Ring area. Opponent is Disqualified and you win the game.
This effect happens even if the card titled Disqualification is placed into your Ringside pile while applying damage from a HEEL maneuver or reversal card.
"It's about time!" - Jim Ross

name: Distract the Ref
effect:
Draw 1 card.
Look at opponent's hand. If he has any cards titled Disqualification! he must discard them.
"Looks like the Ref has more important things to tend to over there!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Diversion
effect:
Your next maneuver may not be reversed.
"What the heck is going on here, that's grounds for disqualification!" - Jim Ross

name: Don't Think Too Hard
effect:
Look at the top 5 cards of an opponent's Arsenal. You may either arrange them in any order or make him shuffle his Arsenal.
"The lights are on but nobody's home. Ha!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Don't You Never ... EVER!
effect:
Reverse any Strike, Grapple or Submission maneuver. End your opponent's turn.
If played from your hand, opponent must discard 2 cards and all your maneuvers next turn are +2D.
Unique
"The Jerichoholics all stand to their feet ..." - Chris Jericho

name: Double Arm DDT
effect:
May only reverse the maneuver titled Back Body Drop.
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"Just seeing that move makes my neck ache!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Double Digits
effect:
Reverse any Strike, Grapple or Submission maneuver. End your opponent's turn.
If played from your hand, opponent must discard 2 cards, then take the top 2 cards from his Arsenal and put them into his Ringside pile.
Unique
"Who does he think he is?!? He's out of control!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Double Leg Takedown
effect:
When successfully played, you may draw 1 card.
"Flat on your back, that'll slow you down. Ha!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Double Team
effect:
To play this card, you must be the "active" legal player of your team. If your previously played card was a successfully played maneuver, a tag team partner may now play a single maneuver against your "active" opponent at a bonus +5D. Opponent may attempt to reverse the maneuver as usual.
"Hey, ref, open your eyes!" - Jim Ross

name: Drop Kick
effect:
May only reverse the maneuver titled Drop Kick.
"Picture-perfect!" - Jim Ross

name: Ego Boost
effect:
Your next card played is -5F.
If opponent forces you to discard a card from your hand, you may choose to discard this card from your hand and then draw up to 2 cards.
"Pure adrenaline, that's what he's on, pure adrenaline!" - Jim Ross

name: Elbow to the Face
effect:
May reverse any maneuver that does 7D or less. End your opponent's turn.
"Hard shot right to the nose, that will stop most anything." - Jim Ross

name: Ensugiri
effect:
May only reverse the maneuver titled Kick.
"Easy for you to say ..." - Jim Ross

name: Escape Move
effect:
Reverse any Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
"Nice Greco-Roman style counter!" - Jim Ross

name: Facebuster
effect:
If played from your hand, may reverse a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip. End your opponent's turn. You may draw 2 cards.
Unique
"HHH's man has him - no - wait! - The Game is a Master!" - Jim Ross

name: Figure Four Leg Lock
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
Stun Value: 1
"The pressure on your knee with this is unbearable - I know!" - Jim Ross

name: Fireman's Carry
effect:
When successfully played, you may look at your opponent's hand.
"Up ... Down ... Can't he make up his mind?" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Fisherman's Suplex
effect:
When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile. You may draw 1 card.
"He's locked and loaded!" - Jim Ross

name: Flash in the Pan
effect:
Draw 1 card.
Look at opponent's hand, and then make him discard all HEEL cards.
"We've got enough heels in this business!" - Jim Ross

name: Full Nelson
effect:
When successfully played, look through your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.
"It's gonna take a whole lot to pry apart them fingers!" - Jim Ross

name: Get Crowd Support
effect:
Draw 1 card.
Your next maneuver this turn is +4D and opponent's reversals are +12F.
"He's rallying them behind him!" - Jim Ross

name: Guillotine Stretch
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card and you may draw 1 card.
"I don't envy that man, he'll never stand straight again." - Jim Ross

name: Gut Buster
effect: "He's lucky he didn't lose his lunch!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Have a Nice Day!
effect:
Reverse any Strike, Grapple or Submission maneuver. End your opponent's turn.
If played from your hand, opponent discards all cards in his hand.
Unique
"Have a Nice Day!" - Mankind

name: Haymaker
effect:
When successfully played, all Strike maneuvers are +1D for the rest of this turn.
"One right after another, that'll put him away!" - Michael Cole

name: Head Butt
effect:
When successfully played, discard 1 card of your choice from your hand.
"That's using his head" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Headlock Takedown
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must draw 1 card.
"Great amateur move!" - Jim Ross

name: Hellfire & Brimstone
effect:
All players discard all cards from their hands. Your opponent places the top 5 cards of his Arsenal into his Ringside pile.
Unique

name: HHH
effect:
Superstar Ability:
None, isn't the starting hand size enough!
He is "The Game" after all!

name: Hip Toss
effect: "Up and over!" - Kevin Kelly

name: Hmmm
effect:
Look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal. You may either arrange them in any order or shuffle your Arsenal.
"What's he up to?" - Jim Ross

name: Hurricanrana
effect:
SV: 1

name: I Am the Game.
effect:
All your maneuvers are +3D for the rest of this turn.
Draw 2 cards, or force opponent to discard 2 cards.
Unique
"He's either the Federation's biggest egomaniac ... or he's right." - Jim Ross

name: Inverse Atomic Drop
effect:
SV: 1
"He'll be singing soprano for a week!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Irish Whip
effect:
As an action, if your next card played is a Strike maneuver it is +5D.
As a reversal, may only reverse the card titled Irish Whip. If so, you end opponent's turn; and if your next card played on your turn is a Strike maneuver it is +5D.
"Whips him to the ropes, setting him up for his ..." - Jim Ross

name: Jockeying for Position
effect:
As an action, if your next card played is a Grapple maneuver, declare whether it will be +4D or your opponent's reversal to it will be +8F.
As a reversal, may only reverse the card titled Jockeying for Position. If so, you end opponent's turn; and if your next card played on your turn is a Grapple maneuver, declare whether it will be +4D or your opponent's reversal to it will be +8F.
"Who's in control in there?" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: KANE
effect:
Superstar Ability:
At the start of your turn, before your draw segment, opponent must take the top card from his Arsenal and place it into his Ringside pile.

name: Kane's Chokeslam
effect:
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"He's got him by the throat - what strength!" - Jim Ross

name: Kane's Flying Clothesline
effect:
Can only be played after a 4D or greater maneuver.
Reversals to this maneuver are +6D.
Unique

"That Big Red Retard is crazy!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Kane's Return!
effect:
Reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
If played from your hand, take the top 4 cards from your Arsenal and put them in your Ringside pile; next turn, all your maneuvers are +2D, and all opponents reversals are +15F.
Unique

effect:
-6F on this card if played after the card titled Kane's Choke Slam.
Unique

name: Kick
effect:
When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile.

name: Knee to the Gut
effect:
Can only reverse a Strike that does 7D or less. End your opponent's turn.
# = D of maneuver card being reversed. Read as 0 when in your Ring area.
"That would've stopped an elephant!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Leaping Knee to the Face
effect:
May not be reversed.
You must play the card titled Irish Whip before playing this card.
When successfully played, opponent discards 1 card.
Unique
"A devastating display of ring generalship!" - Jim Ross

name: Lionsault
effect:
Can only be played after a 4D or greater maneuver.
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"His man is down, Jericho runs, jumps, springboards - Oh my!" - Jim Ross

name: Lou Thesz Press
effect:
If played from your hand, may reverse a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip. End your opponent's turn. You may draw 1 card.
Unique
"Off the ropes and - wait! - Austin springs off them!" - Jim Ross

name: Maintain Hold
effect:
Play after a successful Submission maneuver not reversed and end your turn. You and your opponent may not play maneuvers or actions until your opponent reverses the maintained Submission. On your turn, during the main segment, the Submission does its damage, along with any other abilities on the card. If a reversal is played by your opponent or is revealed while applying damage, both Maintain Hold and the Submission maneuver remain in your Ring area, but you may no longer use the ability of this Maintain Hold card.
"How long can he keep this up?" - Jim Ross

name: Manager Interferes
effect:
Reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
If played from your hand draw 1 card.
"Why is she at ringside! She's up to no good!" - Jim Ross

name: Mandible Claw
effect:
-6F on this card if Mr. Socko card is in your Ring area.
You may play the card titled Maintain Hold after this card as if it were a Submission maneuver.
Unique
Stun Value: 3
"Right in his mouth! That filthy, stinking sock!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: MANKIND
effect:
Superstar Ability:
You must always draw 2 cards, if possible, during your draw segment. All damage from opponent is at -1D.

name: Marking Out
effect:
Choose one: Look through your Arsenal and put 1 card in your hand, shuffle it and end your turn; or go through opponent's Arsenal and put any 3 cards into his Ringside pile, then shuffle his Arsenal.
"The fans are going nuts!" - Jim Ross

name: Mr. Socko
effect:
Take 1 card from either your Arsenal or Ringside pile and place it into your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.
While Mr. Socko is in your Ring area, all your maneuvers are +1D.
Unique
"I've got two words for you ... Sock O!" - Mankind

name: No Chance in Hell
effect:
Reverse any ACTION card being played by your opponent from his hand.
It is unsuccessful, goes to his Ringside pile, has no effect and ends his turn.
"Pack your bags, You're Fired!" - Vincent K. McMahon

name: Not Yet
effect:
Take a card in your hand, shuffle it into your Arsenal, then draw 2 cards.
"Just a minute there, jabroni." - The Rock

name: Offer Handshake
effect:
Draw up to 3 cards, then discard 1 card.
"I'm putting my hand out, son, shake It." - Stone Cold Steve Austin

name: Open Up a Can of Whoop-A%$
effect:
Your next maneuver this turn is +6D, and your opponent's reversal to it is +20F.
Draw a card.
Unique

name: Partner Interference
effect:
If played from your hand and if you are an "inactive" player of your team; reverses any maneuver. End your opponent's turn. Play proceeds with your partner's turn.
"Huh? What? No, I didn't see anything, Ross!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Pat & Gerry
effect:
Opponent skips his next turn.

effect:

Unique

name: Power of Darkness
effect:

Unique

name: Power Slam
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
Stun Value: 1
"That'll knock the wind out of your sails!" - Michael Cole

name: Powerbomb
effect:
When successfully played, you may draw 1 card. Add +1D for every maneuver with the word "slam" in its title in your Ring area.

name: Press Slam
effect:
When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile. Opponent must discard 2 cards.

"What an awesome display of strength!" - Jim Ross

name: Pump Handle Slam
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must discard 2 cards.

name: Punch
effect: "Pow! Right in the kisser!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Puppies! Puppies!
effect:
Shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. Then draw 2 cards.
"Puppies! Puppies! Oops ... my attention was elsewhere JR, what just happened?" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Recovery
effect:
Shuffle any 2 cards from your Ringside pile back into your Arsenal. Then draw 1 card.
"Looks like he's getting his second wind. And it ain't smelling so good!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Reverse DDT
effect:
When successfully played, you may draw 1 card.
"Great twist to a classic maneuver!" - Kevin Kelly

name: Rock Bottom
effect:
When successfully played, look through your Ringside pile and Arsenal for the card titled The People's Elbow and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.
May only reverse a Grapple maneuver, but you must first discard 1 card.
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"Rock Bottom! Rock Bottom! It's over!" - Jim Ross

name: Roll Out of the Ring
effect:
Discard up to 2 cards from your hand to your Ringside pile. Return an equal number of cards of your choice to your hand from your Ringside pile.

name: Rolling Takedown
effect:
Can only reverse a Grapple that does 7D or less. End your opponent's turn.
# = D of maneuver card being reversed. Read as 0 when in your Ring area.

name: Roundhouse Punch
effect: "He's rearing back and gonna unload another shot!" - Kevin Kelly

name: Running Elbow Smash
effect:
When successfully played, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile.

name: Russian Leg Sweep
effect: "Nobody does it better in the business." - Jim Ross

name: Samoan Drop
effect:
When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.

name: Shake It Off
effect:
Playable only if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Remove any 1 card in opponent's Ring area with a D value less than or equal to your total Fortitude Rating and place it into his Ringside pile.
"Looks as though that didn't phase him a bit." - Jim Ross

name: Shane O'Mac
effect:
While this card is in your Ring area, at the start of your turn, before your draw segment, opponent must take the top card from his Arsenal and place it into his Ringside pile.

name: Shoulder Block
effect:

name: Snap Mare
effect:

name: Spear
effect:

name: Spinning Heel Kick
effect:

name: Spit At Opponent

name: Stagger

name: Undertaker's Tombstone Piledriver
effect:
As an action, you may discard this card to draw 1 card. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent.
Unique
Stun Value: 3
"Rest ... in ... Peace." - The Undertaker

name: Vertical Suplex
effect:
May only reverse the maneuver titled Vertical Suplex.
"They're both gonna have to reach down deep to pull this one off!" - Jim Ross

name: View of Villainy
effect:
Draw 1 card.
Look at opponent's hand, and then make him discard all FACE cards.
"Get rid of them! Get rid of them all!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Walls of Jericho
effect:
You may play the card titled Maintain Hold after this card as if it were a Submission maneuver.
Unique
Stun Value: 3
"Jericho is about to score another victory ... a-gain!" - Jim Ross

name: Whaddya Got?
effect:
Look at opponent's hand.
"You wonder who's holding all the cards in this match ..." - Jim Ross

name: World Wrestling Federation European Title Belt
effect:
Play at the beginning of the match; reveal with your Superstar player card.
Your Star Value is +1
Unique

name: World Wrestling Federation Heavyweight Title Belt
effect:
Play at the beginning of the match; reveal with your Superstar player card.
Your Star Value is +3
Unique

name: World Wrestling Federation Intercontinental Title Belt
effect:
Play at the beginning of the match; reveal with your Superstar player card.
Your Star Value is +2
Unique

name: Wrist Lock
effect: "That is certainly more painful than it looks!" - Kevin Kelly

name: Y2J
effect:
Draw up to 5 Cards or force opponent to discard up to 5 cards.
Unique
"Jericho is the man for this Millennium. He is holding all the cards!" - Jim Ross
